articles.author: Michael Ruiz
articles.title: Far-left activist Leonard Peltier, serving life in murders of 2 FBI agents, leaves prison under Biden clemency - Fox News
articles.description: Killer and American Indian Movement activist Leonard Peltier to receive welcome home bash 49 years after conviction in FBI agents' murders at Pine Ridge.
articles.content: Leonard Peltier, the 80-year-old activist and "remorseless killer" who has been in prison for just shy of 50 years in connection with a 1975 ambush shooting that left two FBI agents dead on a South D… [+6543 chars]
